name: Hannah The Movie
description: Step into the secret dual life of Miley Stewart and Hannah Montana in "Hannah Montana The Movie".  Join Hannah Montana and live the rockstar life while you get to know Miley Stewart and explore the world she left back in Tennessee.  Customize Hannah and Miley's wardrobes with outfits seen in the movie and more!  Journey beyond the movie and embark on hometown adventures to complete quests that unlock hit-songs, concert stages, exciting clothing and accessories.  Live the Best of Both Worlds!
